skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my dashboard
des:
The skill "My Dashboard - News, Lists and Entertainment" displays widgets on devices with a screen that enable access to information, news, lists and entertainment.

The following widgets have been implemented so far (more to come):

- Time & date
- Live streaming for selected internet radio and TV channels (touch to enlarge)
- Media channel selector
- News tickers
- View random images (touch to enlarge)
- Alexa to-do list (requires access rights approval)
- Alexa shopping list (requires access rights approval)
- Show random comics from XKCD.com (touch to enlarge)
- Show ISS Tracker
- Simple notepad(s)
- Dice (random number from 1 to 6)
- "Throw a coin" / "yes or no"
- launchers for various material from the web
- Bitcoin tracker (Disclaimer: the numbers shown are updated regularly and may be out of date if there are short-term changes. Please note that all rates are for information purposes only. They are not intended to be used for investment decisions)

If the displayed content (for example in the case of news or long lists) does not fit into a widget, then it can be moved up and down by touch.

The widgets are placed over the standard screen, Alexa can then continue to be used as usual. However, if a native Alexa feature displays different content on the screen, then the skill needs to be restarted.

If you want to specifically end the display of the widgets, you can do this, for example, with the command "Alexa, open home page".

Both more detailed and up to date information can be found on https://mydashboard.applicate.de

Hint: the skill is well suited to be included in an Alexa routine.

The widgets are not yet configurable. That should follow in a later version.
